extendedInfo.description: Expense manager is great application for managing your expenses and incomes: â¢ Tracking expenses and incomes by week, month and year as well as by categoriesâ¢ Multiple accounts in multiple currenciesâ¢ Schedule the payments and recurring paymentsâ¢ Take a picture of receiptâ¢ Payment alertsâ¢ Budget by day, week, month and yearâ¢ Search and reportsâ¢ Import and export account activities in CSV for desktop softwareâ¢ Dropbox and SD Card backupâ¢ Customize expense categories, payer/payer, payment methods, date format, white or black background, button style etcâ¢ Account transferâ¢ Auto fillâ¢ Convenient tools such calculator, currency converter, tip calculator, sales and tax calculator and credit card calculatorâ¢ Chartsâ¢ WidgetsPERMISSIONS EXPLANATION:Internet Access is used to retrieve currency exchange rate.Camera permission is used to take picture of receipt.Account permission is used to for Google Drive data backupAll data is saved on your phone or your Dropbox account. Nobody but you can access your account.Thanks for the help from:Emilio Blanco for Spanish translation. Christian Glass and Manuel Gruber for German translation.Michel Graciano, Gustavo de Freitas Leite and Ricardo Gomes for Portuguese translationCerrato Renaud for French translationPlease email question and feature request directly to developer.

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: Excellent application. Just one feature required is that in csv reports opening and closing balances should also be shown so that if we see a report for the particular period then along with that particular period\'s summary opening and closing balances are also reflected in the respective report which will make the report complete.
reviews.author: manish goyal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Simply superp I have no words for how to thank the developer of this app, this app has made my daily life so organised & sorted, I would\'ve even bought this app if it costed $50
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This is great tool to manage our expenses n incomes. It shows were u r spending more n ultimatly u can save that part by controlling next month. Great app
reviews.author: hemanshu vasava

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: In built application like currency converter, calculator are amazing.. We can manage multiple accounts and we could edit everything as if what we want.. Finally its a great App.
reviews.author: Anto RobinsoN

reviews.title: Can\'t live without it
reviews.comment: Great for tracking multiple acoounts, expenses, and networth! Handy widgets as well :-)
reviews.author: Hazel Anne De Leon-Esguerra

reviews.title: Almost Perfect! Some issues
reviews.comment: Cant live without it! Keep it up. I cant figure out how to use budget roll over feature, always \'dimmed\'/not active. Update: thx! Figured it out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple yet comprehensive
reviews.comment: Just love it, saves me loads of time and effort! Just as a thought, I think it would be nice to have the 1st day of the month separate from the 1st day of FINANCIAL year. Of course, that would require an extra option to display two different balances when necessary, but would come in handy! :) Overall, keep up the great job guys!
reviews.author: Leyli Bektashi-Brown

reviews.title: Easy to use and Practical
reviews.comment: its very user friendly and convenient, easy to customize as needed
reviews.author: Leya Hanna

reviews.title: Very Excellent
reviews.comment: Dude awesome app. The latest reminder option s too awesome. Love this app. Thank U friend...
reviews.author: Malan A

reviews.title: Invaluable Business Tool
reviews.comment: Great App! Straightforward interface, works without any bugs on my GS3, keeps track of all my expenses across multiple projects, and allows me to export expense reports via *.csv files. I have recommended this app to friends and colleagues.
reviews.author: D. Schwarz

reviews.title: Useful, full featured and free!
reviews.comment: Few free apps have the full features of Expense Manager. The good thing is that this app works! There are a few minor bugs which might have been addressed already in this 6#9 update. UI can still be cleaned up and simplified but i\'m not complaining.
reviews.author: Anton Soriano

reviews.comment: Very useful..very simple to the use..
reviews.author: pavel v

reviews.comment: Very useful for maintaining accounts...
reviews.author: Mahi Kirola Kirola

reviews.title: decent enough
reviews.comment: almost perfect EXCEPT sometimes some of the transactions get erased for some reason unknown to me. also would be better if offline use is allowed.
reviews.author: leslie weber

reviews.title: Exactly the app in needed
reviews.comment: Keep improving........and well done
reviews.author: Gaurav Rupani

reviews.title: Account summary System freezes after update...
reviews.comment: What\'s happened to the Account summary widget?  Once pressed, a msg pop out -  Unresponsive, need to be closed. Pls fix it
reviews.author: Terryl Ng

reviews.title: Finally sync!
reviews.comment: I have been waiting for the dropbox sync. Working sometime. Have to make sure latest data has been uploaded. Sometimes it will overwrite with old data from dropbox.
reviews.author: Chidori Kaname

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: amit narwane

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: New update bring more stability.
reviews.author: Hafizul Zainordin

reviews.title: Pattern lock
reviews.comment: Add option to set pattern lock, Good work guys
reviews.author: Saran Droid
